languages.text: "Ограничения в толковании Лекс Империалис — это поводок, который гарантирует, что слабые и недальновидные Арбитес не дадут маху. Я давно перерос рамки системы и вижу ее изъяны. И, если во имя порядка в Империуме, мне придется что-то сломать и выстроить заново, я это сделаю".

"Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."
languages.original_text: "Ограничения в толковании Лекс Империалис — это поводок, который гарантирует, что слабые и недальновидные Арбитес не дадут маху. Я давно перерос рамки системы и вижу ее изъяны. И, если во имя порядка в Империуме, мне придется что-то сломать и выстроить заново, я это сделаю".

traits.locale_text: "Constrained interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアの狭義的な解釈など、視野が狭く、力の足りないアービトレイターが迷わぬようにつけられた『首輪』にすぎません。私はその枠組みをとうに超えており、すでにその欠陥が見えています。帝国の秩序を守るために何かを壊し、再び築き上げねばならないというのなら、私はそうするつもりです」
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアの狭義的な解釈など、視野が狭く、力の足りないアービトレイターが迷わぬようにつけられた『首輪』にすぎません。私はその枠組みをとうに超えており、すでにその欠陥が見えています。帝国の秩序を守るために何かを壊し、再び築き上げねばならないというのなら、私はそうするつもりです」

languages.text: "Enge Interpretationen des Lex Imperia sind eine Leine, die schwache und kurzsichtige Arbitratoren vor dem Stolpern bewahren sollen. Ich habe mich längst über die Grenzen dieses Systems erhoben und erkenne seine Makel. Wenn ich etwas zerstören und wieder aufbauen muss, um die Ordnung im Imperium zu wahren, dann werde ich genau das tun."
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."

traits.locale_text: "Enge Interpretationen des Lex Imperia sind eine Leine, die schwache und kurzsichtige Arbitratoren vor dem Stolpern bewahren sollen. Ich habe mich längst über die Grenzen dieses Systems erhoben und erkenne seine Makel. Wenn ich etwas zerstören und wieder aufbauen muss, um die Ordnung im Imperium zu wahren, dann werde ich genau das tun."

languages.text: « Les interprétations étriquées de la Lex Imperialis sont des œillères destinées à empêcher les arbitrators les plus faibles de s'écarter du droit chemin. Cela fait bien longtemps que je me suis affranchi de ces entraves et je perçois désormais les défauts de cette loi. Si je dois briser afin de mieux reconstruire pour faire régner l'ordre dans l'Imperium, je le ferai. »
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."

traits.locale_text: « Les interprétations étriquées de la Lex Imperialis sont des œillères destinées à empêcher les arbitrators les plus faibles de s'écarter du droit chemin. Cela fait bien longtemps que je me suis affranchi de ces entraves et je perçois désormais les défauts de cette loi. Si je dois briser afin de mieux reconstruire pour faire régner l'ordre dans l'Imperium, je le ferai. »

languages.text: «La interpretación literal de la Lex Imperialis es un yugo diseñado para evitar que los Arbitrator más débiles y cortos de miras titubeen en el cumplimiento del deber. Hace ya mucho que yo he trascendido los límites de este sistema, y veo claramente sus deficiencias. Si he de romper algo para recomponerlo a fin de mantener el orden en el Imperium, entonces es lo que debo hacer».
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."

traits.locale_text: «La interpretación literal de la Lex Imperialis es un yugo diseñado para evitar que los Arbitrator más débiles y cortos de miras titubeen en el cumplimiento del deber. Hace ya mucho que yo he trascendido los límites de este sistema, y veo claramente sus deficiencias. Si he de romper algo para recomponerlo a fin de mantener el orden en el Imperium, entonces es lo que debo hacer».

languages.text: “对帝国律法的狭隘解释是一种束缚，旨在防止那些意志软弱、缺乏远见的法务官误入歧途。如今，我已经摆脱了这些束缚，也看到了这种解释的缺陷。如果为了维护帝国的秩序，我必须打碎已有的规矩，再将这一切重建起来，那我愿意这么做。”
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."

traits.locale_text: “对帝国律法的狭隘解释是一种束缚，旨在防止那些意志软弱、缺乏远见的法务官误入歧途。如今，我已经摆脱了这些束缚，也看到了这种解释的缺陷。如果为了维护帝国的秩序，我必须打碎已有的规矩，再将这一切重建起来，那我愿意这么做。”

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis'in sığ yorumları, zayıf ve dar görüşlü Yargıcıların tökezlemesini önlemek için tasarlanmış bir tasmadır. Ben bu sistemin sınırlarını çoktan aştım ve kusurlarını görebiliyorum. İmparatorluk'ta düzeni korumak adına bir şeyleri yıkıp yeniden inşa etmem gerekiyorsa bu uğurda geri adım atmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash designed to prevent weak and short-sighted Arbitrators from stumbling. I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws. If I must break something and build it back up again in the name of keeping order in the Imperium, then that is what I will do."
